description: The brutal field commander of the Titans. While the Titans are effectively a private army controlled by Admiral Jamitov Hymem, Bask is the organisation`s day-to-day leader, responsible for devising strategies and commanding operations. Bask considers his troops above the law and beyond the reach of the Earth Federation command structure, and doesn`t hesitate to take hostages or commit mass murder if it seems like the most effective way to crush dissent.
name: Bask Om
